item.title: Teleport help
item.dc:creator: @WRX WRX`
item.description:
@WRX wrote:

amiamage0:

How do i change the teleport to locations like ((v)) (vorrock) teleport to tele to lumbridge and how do i make a menu pop up with different teleport locations?

Changing where a teleport “goes”:

open your client class.search for packet 185, which is “clicking most buttons”.

case 185:

Then inside there you will find the varrock teleport, if the varrock teleport doesn’t currently teleport then just add in (underneath a switch statement) the following:

case 4140: // Varrock Tele - WRX`
teleportToX = ###;
teleportToY = ###;
heightLevel = 0;
break;

Change the hashes to the coordinates of where you want it to teleport.

To make the teleport give multiple choices you could use NPC dialogue; here is a taste:

case 4140: // Varrock Tele - Renegade
NpcDialogue = ###;
break;

To find out how to give multiple options; you should find a tutorial on NPC Dialogues.


Info: A switch statement is a statment that lets you use packets instead of “if statements”, here is an example of the switch statement that should be in packet 185:

switch (actionButtonId) {

//a lot of things will be here which are the packets for other
//buttons....kay? - WRX`

}

Read full topic
